deployment.author: N/A
deployment.message:
{"type":"deployment","sha":"e5654d5dfddd4ce2e1ec1825dcab0b25861cdd99","repoName":"amb-emilb/workbook-teams-bot","actor":"amb-emilb","slotName":"production","commitMessage":"CRITICAL SECURITY FIX: Enforce authentication on Teams bot endpoint

- Add Authorization header validation to reject unauthorized requests
- Implement rate limiting (100 requests/minute per IP)
- Add security headers (X-Frame-Options, HSTS, etc.)
- Add User-Agent validation for Bot Framework requests
- Improve error handling to prevent information leakage
- Add comprehensive request logging for security monitoring

This fixes the critical vulnerability where the bot endpoint was accessible
to anyone on the internet without proper authentication."}
